Under "implications of the suspension," changing 1996 to 2006. There were no rain outs in the 1996 world series. However Game 4 of the 2006 series was postponed a day due to rain. editing to reflect t
under quotes of the series, adding the final out of the series as called by Joe Buck

added quote of the series and info about the series matching two div. winners
